title: Maple syrup production in Canada 2008 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in million gallons, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately negative which exists from 2011 to 2008.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2013.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2013 to 2011.
gold: This statistic shows the maple syrup production in Canada from 2008 to 2019 . Approximately 13.2 million gallons of maple syrup was produced in Canada in 2019 , up from 9.8 million gallons the previous year . Maple syrup in Canada - additional information Maple syrup is most commonly associated with Canada , the product 's largest producer .
